Title: ~Hack~ Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Pink Edition
RichPresencePatch:
Format:Value
FormatType=VALUE

Lookup:Act
0x000=🌴Emerald Hill 1
0x001=🌴Emerald Hill 2
0xd00=🌆Chemical Plant 1
0xd01=🌆Chemical Plant 2
0xf00=💧Aquatic Ruin 1
0xf01=💧Aquatic Ruin 2
0x300=🏜️Sand Shower 1
0x301=🏜️Sand Shower 2
0xc00=🎰Casino Nisght 1
0xc01=🎰Casino Night 2
0x700=🔥Hill Top 1
0x701=🔥Hill Top 2
0xb00=🕯️Mystic Cave 1
0xb01=🕯️Mystic Cave 2
0x801=🦇Hidden Palace
0xa00=🛢️Oil Ocean 1
0xa01=🛢️Oil Ocean 2
0x400=⚙️Metropolis 1
0x401=⚙️Metropolis 2
0x402=⚙️Metropolis 3
0x200=🌳Secret Wood 1
0x201=🌳Secret Wood 2
0x1000=☁️Sky Chase
0x600=✈️Wing Fortress
0xe00=🌑Death Egg

Lookup:Heart
0x00=💗
0x01=💗
0x02=🧡
0x03=💜
0x04=💜

Lookup:Char
0x00=Amy and Cream
0x01=Amy Rose
0x02=Cream the rabbit
0x03=Big and Cream
0x04=Big the cat

Lookup:Difficulty
0x02=Easy
0x00=Normal
0x01=Hard

Lookup:Scene
0x04=Main Menu
0x24=Options
0x1c=Versus
0x28=Level Select
0x10=Special Stage
0x88=Demo
0x08=Demo

Lookup:Super
0x00=
0x01=Super 

Display:
?0xHf601=H10?Special Stage 💎@Value(0xH00fe17)/7
?0xHf601=H20?🏆 Game completed. 💎@Value(0xH00fe17)/7
?N:0xHf601!=0_0xHf601!=Hc_0xHf601!=H8c?@Scene(0xHf601)
?O:0xHf601=H8c_0xHf601=Hc_0xH00fe25<Ha?@Super(0xH00fe18)@Char(0xH00ff70) @Heart(0xH00ff70)x@Value(0xH00fe13) 💎@Value(0xH00fe17)/7 ⏰@Value(0xH00fe22):0@Value(0xH00fe25) @Act(0x00fe10) - @Difficulty(0xH00ff60)
?O:0xHf601=H8c_0xHf601=Hc_0xH00fe25>=Ha?@Super(0xH00fe18)@Char(0xH00ff70) @Heart(0xH00ff70)x@Value(0xH00fe13) 💎@Value(0xH00fe17)/7 ⏰@Value(0xH00fe22):@Value(0xH00fe25) @Act(0x00fe10) - @Difficulty(0xH00ff60)
Playing Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Pink Edition

Achievements.Title: Death Egg Zone
Achievements.Description: Finish Death Egg act. (Level Select Disabled)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Piko Piko Hammer
Achievements.Description: Amy Alone: Defeat 58 badniks in Sky chase. (Hard, Level Select Allowed)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: The Tornado Biplane
Achievements.Description: Amy or Big: Finish the whole Sky chase without destroying any badnik and without collecting rings. (Hard, Level Select Allowed)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: This airspace is mine, go away!
Achievements.Description: Cream: Defeat all 61 badniks in Sky chase. (Hard, Level Select Allowed)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Boing, Boing!
Achievements.Description: Finish Emerald Hill act 1 with a spring.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Chaos Emeralds
Achievements.Description: Have all 7 emeralds. (Level Select Disabled)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Hard Mode
Achievements.Description: Amy or Cream: Finish the game on the hard difficulty. (Level Select Disabled)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: No Fishing Rod
Achievements.Description: Big Alone: Beat the last Dr. Robotnik without pressing A. (Hard, Level Select Allowed)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Oh no, I lost my hammer
Achievements.Description: Amy Alone: Finish the whole Emerald Hill act 1 without pressing Back, Forward and A.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Froggy, my friend!
Achievements.Description: Big: Find Froggy in 19 acts. Except: Sand Shower, Hidden Palace, Secret Wood and Death Egg. (Level Select Disabled)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Big the Cat
Achievements.Description: Finish the game as Big and without Cream as partner. (Level Select Disabled)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Cream the Rabbit
Achievements.Description: Finish the game as Cream. (Level Select Disabled)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Amy Rose
Achievements.Description: Finish the game as Amy and without Cream as partner. (Level Select Disabled)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Emerald Hill Zone
Achievements.Description: Finish both Emerald Hill acts. (Level Select Disabled)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Sky Zone
Achievements.Description: Finish Sky Chase and Wing Fortress acts. (Level Select Disabled)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos
